bill_title: repeal certain provisions permitting the payment for lands acquired by eminent domain including the cost and expenses of condemnation proceedings from the Department of Game, Fish, and Parks fund.
keywords: Department of Game, Fish and Parks

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to repeal certain provisions permitting the payment for lands acquired by eminent domain including the cost and expenses of condemnation proceedings from the Department of Game, Fish, and Parks fund. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 41-4-2 be repealed. 41-4-2. Payment for lands acquired by eminent domain, including the cost and expenses of condemnation proceedings, shall be paid out of the Department of Game, Fish and Parks fund, and such part of such fund as may be necessary is hereby appropriated for such purposes, and the state auditor shall issue warrants upon the state treasurer against such fund upon vouchers duly approved by the Game, Fish and Parks Commission.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
